Description.0: Group Project: "Peer observation and feedback" In pairs, students observe each others work as teaching assistance and provide observations, feedback and reflections to each other.
Description.1: Attendance: Students must physically attend the timetabled workshop sessions, and pro-actively engage in the various in-class discussions and exercises
Description.2: Assignment: Evidence of engagement with RSP panel, and pro-active analysis of suitable credit-bearing modules
Description.3: Assignment: Students must demonstrate that they have engaged with and passed the designated online research integrity training, as well as the School safety induction.
Description.4: Assignment: Creation of a polished slide deck or poster, succinctly exploring some aspect of academic life
Description.5: Assignment: Exercise to demonstrate a fluent workflow in technical computing for research purposes, including creation of graphics for integration within LaTeX documents
